club.name: Leo Club of Ananda College
club.about: A student-led club committed to service, leadership development, and community impact at Ananda College.

join.how: Complete the application form and attend an orientation. Selection may include a brief interview.

board.note: Board to be announced; will appear on the Board page once finalized.

projects.title: Community Clean-Up
projects.description: Quarterly neighborhood clean-up with student volunteers and local partners.

projects.title: Book Donation Drive
projects.description: Collecting educational materials for under-resourced schools.

leo_general.what_is_leo: LEO stands for Leadership, Experience, Opportunity. Leo Clubs are youth organizations of Lions Clubs International focused on developing leadership through service.
leo_general.age_range: Typically ages 12â€“30 depending on local regulations and club structures.
leo_general.activities: Community service projects, leadership training, fundraising, and collaborations with Lions Clubs.
leo_general.benefits: Leadership development, teamwork, networking, and making tangible community impact.
